statements: DELETE FROM User_Payment_Information WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM User_Payment_Information WHERE user_id = 123 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM User_Payment_Information WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456' AND cvv = 123;
DELETE FROM User_Payment_Information WHERE payment_method = 'PayPal' AND billing_address LIKE '%New York%';
DELETE FROM user_payment_information WHERE payment_amount > 1000 and payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'Failed' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, transaction_date, NOW()) > 24;
DELETE FROM user_payment_information WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM transaction_history);
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM payment_methods WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456');
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE account_number LIKE 'A%';
